Eating properly
It’s very important to eat 
properly (see chapter 5). If you 
want to lose weight, don’t rush 
it. A balanced varied diet and 
regular activity will help you 
lose weight gradually. Try to 
make time to sit down, relax 
and enjoy your food so that 
you digest it properly. It doesn’t 
have to be complicated. Try 
food like baked potatoes with 
baked beans and cheese, 
salads, pasta, French
